description: This file is the main entry point for a Vue.js application, initializing the app with plugins and mounting it to the DOM.

methods.name: createApp
methods.description: Creates a new Vue application instance with the root component App.

methods.name: app.use
methods.description: Registers plugins or modules with the Vue application, such as Pinia store and router.

methods.name: app.mount
methods.description: Mounts the Vue application to the DOM element with the specified selector.
